Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.

raw_analysis:
### Summary
- Moved code quality tutorials to a top-level `tutorials/improve-code-quality` directory.
- Created a new "Report and fix vulnerabilities" map topic under how-tos.
- Reorganized security advisories and vulnerability reporting into structured how-to sections (`configure-vulnerability-reporting`, `report-a-vulnerability`, `fix-reported-vulnerabilities`).
- Added new tutorials for fixing vulnerabilities (`collaborate-in-a-fork` and `write-security-advisories`).
- Updated redirects and references accordingly.

### Title
Reorganize security documentation: Move tutorials and how-tos for vulnerabilities
